verses.verse: We <S%G3767>then,<s%> as <S%G4903>workers<s%> <S%G4903>together<s%> with him, <S%G3870>beseech<s%> you <S%G2532>also<s%> that you <S%G1209>receive<s%> not the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in <S%G2756>vain.<s%>

(For he <S%G3004>said,<s%> I have <S%G1873>heard<s%> you in a <S%G2540>time<s%> <S%G1184>accepted,<s%> and in the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G4991>salvation<s%> have I <S%G997>succored<s%> you: <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> is the <S%G2144>accepted<s%> <S%G2540>time;<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> is the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G4991>salvation.<s%>)
<S%G1325>Giving<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G4349>offense<s%> in <S%G3367>any<s%> thing, that the <S%G1248>ministry<s%> be not <S%G3469>blamed:<s%>

But in <S%G3956>all<s%> things <S%G4921>approving<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> as the <S%G1249>ministers<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> in <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G5281>patience,<s%> in <S%G2347>afflictions,<s%> in <S%G318>necessities,<s%> in <S%G4730>distresses,<s%>
In <S%G4127>stripes,<s%> in <S%G5438>imprisonments,<s%> in <S%G181>tumults,<s%> in <S%G2873>labors,<s%> in <S%G70>watchings,<s%> in <S%G3521>fastings;<s%>
By <S%G54>pureness,<s%> by <S%G1108>knowledge,<s%> by <S%G3115>long-suffering,<s%> by <S%G5544>kindness,<s%> by the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost,<s%> by <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G505>unfeigned,<s%>

By the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G225>truth,<s%> by the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> by the <S%G3696>armor<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> on the <S%G1188>right<s%> hand and on the <S%G710>left,<s%>
By <S%G1391>honor<s%> and <S%G819>dishonor,<s%> by <S%G1426>evil<s%> <S%G1426>report<s%> and <S%G2162>good<s%> <S%G2162>report:<s%> as <S%G4108>deceivers,<s%> and yet <S%G227>true;<s%>
As <S%G50>unknown,<s%> and yet <S%G1921>well<s%> <S%G1921>known;<s%> as <S%G599>dying,<s%> and, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> we <S%G2198>live;<s%> as <S%G3811>chastened,<s%> and not <S%G2289>killed;<s%>

As <S%G3076>sorrowful,<s%> <S%G1161>yet<s%> <S%G104>always<s%> <S%G5463>rejoicing;<s%> as <S%G4434>poor,<s%> <S%G1161>yet<s%> <S%G4148>making<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4148>rich;<s%> as <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3367>nothing,<s%> and yet <S%G2722>possessing<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things.
O you <S%G2881>Corinthians,<s%> our <S%G4750>mouth<s%> is <S%G455>open<s%> to you, our <S%G2588>heart<s%> is <S%G4115>enlarged.<s%>
You are not <S%G4729>straitened<s%> in us, but you are <S%G4729>straitened<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> own <S%G4698>bowels.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> for a <S%G489>recompense<s%> in the <S%G846>same,<s%> (I <S%G3004>speak<s%> as to my <S%G5043>children,<s%>) be you <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4115>enlarged.<s%>

Be you not <S%G2086>unequally<s%> <S%G2086>yoked<s%> <S%G2086>together<s%> with <S%G571>unbelievers:<s%> for <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3352>fellowship<s%> has <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> with <S%G458>unrighteousness?<s%> and <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2842>communion<s%> has <S%G5457>light<s%> with <S%G4655>darkness?<s%>

And <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G4857>concord<s%> has <S%G5547>Christ<s%> with <S%G955>Belial?<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3310>part<s%> has he that <S%G4103>believes<s%> with an <S%G571>infidel?<s%>

And <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G4783>agreement<s%> has the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> with <S%G1497>idols?<s%> for you are the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God;<s%> as <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G2036>said,<s%> I will <S%G1774>dwell<s%> in them, and <S%G1704>walk<s%> in them; and I will be their <S%G2316>God,<s%> and they shall be my <S%G2992>people.<s%>

<S%G1352>Why<s%> <S%G1831>come<s%> out from <S%G3319>among<s%> them, and be you <S%G873>separate,<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and <S%G680>touch<s%> not the <S%G169>unclean<s%> thing; and I will <S%G1523>receive<s%> you.
And will be a <S%G3962>Father<s%> to you, and you shall be my <S%G5207>sons<s%> and <S%G2364>daughters,<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3841>Almighty.<s%>
